sentence.Network_en: A gentleman should always be civil, even to his inferiors.
sentence.Network_cn: 绅士应该总是彬彬有礼,即便是对地位不及自己者.

sentence.Network_en: The gentleman, despite his advanced years, helped Kathryn back to her seat.
sentence.Network_cn: 这位绅士，尽管年事已高，仍然帮着凯瑟琳回到座位上。

sentence.Network_en: I got this phone call from a gentleman, who seemed sincere enough.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个电话是一位绅士打来的，他似乎非常诚恳。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (in the sense 'man of noble birth'): from gentle + man, translating Old French gentilz hom. In later use the term denoted a man of a good family (especially one entitled to a coat of arms) but not of the nobility

entry.def: A gentleman is a man who comes from a family of high social standing.

example.ex: ...this wonderful portrait of English gentleman Joseph Greenway.
example.tran: 英国绅士约瑟夫·格林韦的精美画像

entry.tran: 有教养的人；彬彬有礼的人；君子
entry.def: If you say that a man is a gentleman, you mean he is polite and educated, and can be trusted.

example.ex: He was always such a gentleman.

entry.def: You can address men as gentlemen, or refer politely to them as gentlemen.

example.ex: This way, please, ladies and gentlemen...
It seems this gentleman was waiting for the doctor.
example.tran: 这位先生好像在等医生。

entry.def: A gentleman's agreement or a gentlemen's agreement is an informal agreement in which people trust one another to do what they have promised. The agreement is not written down and does not have any legal force.

example.ex: We had no contract; it was done by a gentleman's agreement...
example.tran: 我们没有签合同，就订了个君子协定。

example.ex: She made a gentleman's agreement with her buyer.
example.tran: 她和买主立了个君子协定。

means.word_mean: 2. a manservant who acts as a personal attendant to his employer;

auth_sentence.content: He was a family man and a true gentleman.
auth_sentence.res_content: He was a family man and a true gentleman.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He was a family man and a true gentleman.

auth_sentence.content: A portly, kindly gentleman with...a deep guttural voice.

auth_sentence.content: The classical theological,...theatre-going, card-playing Reverend Gentleman.

Sentence.sentence: The sword hasn't had a military function for a hundred years, but is still part of an officer's full-dress uniform, precisely because a sword always symbolized "an officer and a gentleman.
She isn't going to be shouted down by over-confident young gentlemen.

means.word_mean: 上等人, 绅士, 君子

sentences.en: If he is anything of a gentleman, he will pay the money.
sentences.cn: 倘若他是位真君子, 他会付这笔钱的。

sentences.en: Ladies and gentlemen, it is time to begin.
sentences.cn: 各位女士先生们, 该开会了。
哈瑞打扮得像个富贵闲人。

jushi.english: Not once did the gentleman mention his feeling.
jushi.chinese: 那位老先生从来没有提到过他的感受。

jushi.english: I tell you, gentlemen, this cloth is of the finest quality.
jushi.chinese: 告诉你们,先生们,这种布质量最好。

jushi.english: He is a gentleman by birth.
